arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – The Paris lineup announced with Barcola as a center forward
arts.sum: This Sunday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 8:45 PM, CET). This Friday, Le Parisien published a probable PSG lineup. Kvaratskhelia – Barcola – Lee Ruiz – Zaïre-Emery – Neves Hernandez – Pacho – Zabarnyi – Mayulu Chevalier. A perfectly […]

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Luis Enrique’s press conference live this Saturday
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 PM (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. On the eve of this match, PSG coach Luis Enrique will hold a press conference at 1 PM. You can follow the event live here (we will then publish […]

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Referee appointed for Matchday 12
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 12 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Olympique Lyonnais (8th) at the Groupama Stadium (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been appointed: Benoît Bastien (39 years old), a highly experienced official with 264 Ligue 1 matches to his name. […]
